net.letscode.game.api.entity.twod

Class Entity2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.letscode.game.api.entity.Entity
      • net.letscode.game.api.entity.twod.Entity2D
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JsonSerializable, TargetedSerializable<Entity>, EventBusProvider

    public class Entity2D
extends Entity
    Defines an entity capable of being viewed in 2D space. Note that this explicitly excludes functionality relating to entity movement and position.

    While this class defines a number of useful facilities for Zone2D

    Positional data, as well as the heading, velocity, and other data is kept in the EntityData2D class. Fundamentally, this is intended to allow entities to exist within multiple zones while having different representations within each; however, by convention, properties that are not inherent to the entity should be kept separate regardless of any technical reason for separation.

    Author:
    timothyb89
